lines.text: We didn't find any <c=#FF6000>Reversing Rune</c> stickers lying around...
Why is that? If they've only got three spells, and one of them needs a material component, why wouldn't they have it?
My guess is someone hid them, or destroyed them, and we still don't know why!
That's- are you accusing me of d-d-d-destroying evidence?! I-
I mean, maybe, but it could mean the wizards hid that evidence- and why do that, and not hide all the other evidence of magic?
One we don't have to care about, 'cause they're both dead.
...Man, I guess, but it's weird, right?
